          <title>
            <string language="en">Guitar Lesson 18: Playing Slurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Guitarre Lektion 18: Spielen Von von Slurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Leçon 18 De Guitare : Jeu de Slurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lição 18 Da Guitarra: Jogando Slurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lezione 18 Del Guitar: Gioco Dello Slurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάθημα 18 κιθάρων: Παιχνίδι Slurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lección 18 De la Guitarra: Jugar Slurs</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Introduces slurs, rhythm notation in tablature, and the concept of harmonic analysis.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellt slurs, Rhythmusdarstellung im tablature und

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présente les slurs, la notation de rythme dans le

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισάγει slurs, σημείωση ρυθμού στο tablature, και

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Introduce slurs, la notación del ritmo en 
tablature, y el concepto del análisis armónico.</string>
          </description>
